input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow

Item features:
14x14 fuzzy soft Emojicon pillow,pillow smells like strawberry
Ships from USA,this is not shipped from china..Faster Delivery
Guaranteed up to a year from purchase
All orders ship out in 48 hours! HIGHEST QUALITY.
Smells like strawberry
input_text.Response A:
Introducing the Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow - the ultimate addition to your comfort and relaxation routine. Made with the highest quality materials and designed to provide a soft and fuzzy feel, this pillow is perfect for snuggling up with after a long day.

But the comfort of this pillow isn't the only thing that sets it apart - it also smells like strawberry! Whether you're looking for a way to add a touch of fragrance to your home or simply want a pillow that smells delicious, the Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow is the perfect choice.

And with guaranteed up to a year from purchase, you can trust that this pillow will last for years to come. Plus, all orders ship out in 48 hours from the USA, so you'll receive your purchase quickly and efficiently. Don't wait any longer - order the Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow today!
input_text.Response B: This periodic beer glass and caffeine molecule mug set is perfect for every day, whether you're having coffee in the morning or beer at night. Nerd out with this awesome drinkware!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
